attributes.additional_details:
Charge all companies a fair and equitable rate of Corporation Tax,wherever they are domiciled , even if their business is domiciled abroad.
The tax should be equitable with the proportion of revenue they receive,from each and every country that  they work in.This must be in their yearly accounts.
Failure to do so,automatic fine of £200,000,000.
The Tax should be collected on April 1 every year henceforth.
No exclusion causes accepted.
